Steps.Message: Videos can be included in your action step to guide the user or display content. First let's find a video to load. You can either record it in-app, or select one from the gallery. For now, let's find one from your gallery.
The Video can be shown in portrait or in landscape. You can choose to change it to portrait now, or just click Next.
A trigger can also be added, to jump to a specific step once the video is completed. Let's leave that option disabled for now, just click Next.
All done! Let's load the Video into the scene by pressing Apply.
Let's lower the UI so we can take a look at the augmentation we just created.
This is the Video we just created. You can now hold the middle of it to reposition or hold its edges to resize. That's it!
